domain.name: Person

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

text:
@realDonaldTrump You're investigating the media because of coronavirus coverage?

You Nazi fk. If not for some coverage no one would know a thing. You falsify everything and lie to everyone world wide because of your bloated ego.

Go take your vacation and stop tweeting.

#CoronavirusOutbreak
